ABOUT

box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Since 2016, Convergences has published the Sustainable Solutions Barometer, which aims to mobilise all stakeholders in favour of the Sustainable Development Goals and to highlight concrete solutions for a fairer and more sustainable world. Produced in partnership with the 1Planet4All project, the Barometer aims to provide an annual overview of the efforts being made around the world to achieve a world with Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon and Zero Poverty.

Three years on from the United Nations’ call to combat poverty, inequality and climate change, which culminated in the adoption of the seventeen Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), an initial assessment of progress seems necessary to note the efforts being made around the world to achieve a 3Zero world (Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty).

To reflect this paradigm shift, the Hunger Barometer became the Sustainable Solutions Barometer (SSB) in 2016. The result of the collective work of several associations and organisations, this publication is aimed at the general public, the media and political decision-makers, and aims to raise awareness of the need to mobilise all stakeholders to effectively promote the SDGs and highlight the solutions that address these issues.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_margin=”||-3px|||” z_index_tablet=”500″ border_color_all=”#313f55″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE 2023 EDITION OF THE BAROMETER

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ text_orientation=”justify” custom_margin=”|-11px||||” custom_padding=”|0px||||” text_text_align=”justify” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The latest report from the French High Council for Equality highlights some key data on gender inequality. It shows that in France, 80% of the women questioned in this study felt that they had already been treated less well because of their sex in everyday life, compared with 37% of men.

Far from being unique to France, these inequalities, perceived and experienced, exist everywhere and in a variety of forms. At the crossroads of social, economic and environmental issues, gender problems are a central prism for reading the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Placing this interdependence at the heart of Agenda 2030 and the major international agendas is now crucial.

This 6th edition of the Sustainable Solutions Barometer, entitled “Gender equality around the world: diversity of paths, changing of perceptions”, aims to remind and illustrate the pressing need to consider and integrate the gender issue in all sectors and at all levels.

Alongside our partners and contributors, we offer analyses and solutions from innovative project leaders in the service of the community, and for the achievement of a 3Zero world for which we are working every day: Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/02/BSD-2023_EN_VF_compressed-01.png” title_text=”BSD 2023_EN_VF_compressed-01″ url=”https://bit.ly/BSD2023_EN” _builder_version=”4.24.0″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

excerpt.rendered: ABOUTSince 2016, Convergences has published the Sustainable Solutions Barometer, which aims to mobilise all stakeholders in favour of the Sustainable Development Goals and to highlight concrete solutions for a fairer and more sustainable world. Produced in partnership with the 1Planet4All project, the Barometer aims to provide an annual overview of the efforts being made around […]
